name: Ford Mustang
description: Build and customize your very own 1960s Ford Mustang!Thanks for your review. It's very unusual for a LEGOÂ® set to have any trouble, but in the rare case something is wrong, we're always here to help at LEGO.comService. We're glad you got in touch, and happy building!Scratched pieces? Oh no! Don't worry, though. It's easy to grab replacements. Just go to LEGO.comService and choose the "Bricks & Pieces" option.
